name: Earthen Seal Stone
effect: The Pokémon V this card is attached to can use the VSTAR Power on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
author: AYUMI ODASHIMA

vstar_power.name: Star Gravity
vstar_power.effect: Put damage counters on each of your opponent’s Pokémon V until its remaining HP is 100. (You can’t use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)
